g.text: Model Context Protocol as a Service
Seamlessly integrate AI models, tools, and services with our scalable
MCP infrastructure. Build connected AI experiences in minutes, not months.
Everything you need to build connected AI experiences at scale
Connect any AI model, tool, or service
See how Model Context Protocol connects your AI ecosystem
Choose the plan that fits your needs. Scale up or down anytime.
Yes, upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.
• What happens if I exceed my limits?
We'll notify you and provide options to upgrade or throttle.
We offer a 14-day free trial on all plans.
Model Context Protocol as a Service
Connect your AI ecosystem with the power
Get the latest updates and news
